turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor ödevimi yapmasam, öğretmen beni cezalandıracak.
english_example_sentence: If I were not to make this difficult homework, the teacher would punish me.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я не сделал это сложное домашнее задание, учитель бы меня наказал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor ödevimi ______, öğretmen beni cezalandıracak.
